name: Move Orchestration Agent
description: AI-powered orchestrator for complex moving operations, optimizing timelines and coordinating multiple service providers
author: Siva Nithish Kumar

capabilities.name: Orchestrate Move
capabilities.description: Coordinate complete moving process with timeline optimization and service provider management
examples: Orchestrate a move from London to Manchester on 2025-09-15
Plan a complete household relocation with utility transfers and timeline optimization
Coordinate moving services for a 3-bedroom house including broadband setup

capabilities.name: Optimize Timeline
capabilities.description: Generate optimized timeline for moving process with critical path analysis
examples: Optimize timeline for utility transfers, broadband, and moving company coordination
Generate critical path for move with minimum disruption
Create timeline that prioritizes cost efficiency

capabilities.name: Coordinate Services
capabilities.description: Manage and coordinate multiple service providers for seamless move execution
examples: Coordinate utility companies, broadband providers, and moving services
Manage handover between outgoing and incoming service providers
Synchronize service activation dates across multiple providers

capabilities.name: Estimate Costs
capabilities.description: Provide comprehensive cost estimates for moving operations with breakdown analysis
examples: Estimate total moving costs including all services and timeline options
Provide cost breakdown with service provider comparisons
Calculate premium vs standard service cost differences
